query.statement: SELECT MANDT, CS607_YEAR, CS607_SEQ, CS607_TYP, (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND LANG=#G_LANG# AND CODE2=CS607_TYP AND CODE1='CS200' ) AS CS607_TYPNM, CS607_JAMT, CS607_LAB_J, CS607_LAB_B, CS607_IAMT, CS607_LAB_N, CS607_DIR, CS607_INDIR, CS607_PCOST, CS607_RAT, CS607_SAMT, CS607_CPRC_5, CS607_PCOST_5, CS607_RAT_5, CS607_CART_5, CS607_MPRC FROM SAPHEE.ZCST607 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS607_YEAR = #ZYEAR# AND CS607_TYP = #TYPE# ORDER BY CS607_YEAR, CS607_TYP, CAST(CS607_SEQ AS DECIMAL(2)) ASC WITH UR
